div.h2: III.4. Management System – Credit E&S Risk Review

t.t-if: q['assessment_criteria']=='Management System - Credit E&S risk Review'

i.span: This E&S information note shall be attached to the Guarantee Approval Request.
It should be filled out by the Risk Manager (high risk) or Environmental Social Manager (medium or low risk).

b.span: Summary of the main tasks of the Due Diligence

p.span: Modification of the E&S Standard Clauses (if so, attach the validation by legal department)

b.span: Recommendations by the Environmental & Social Manager or Risk Manager
